official_title: To make a technical correction to the Omnibus Trade and Competitiveness Act of 1988 to provide for the reliquidation of certain petroleum products.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Trade and Competitiveness Act of 1988 to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to reliquidate (provide a refund of duties) on certain entries of petroleum products in California and Oregon.

titles.title: To make a technical correction to the Omnibus Trade and Competitiveness Act of 1988 to provide for the reliquidation of certain petroleum products.
